sentences.en: A pair of Goldsmith customers we spoke to will do just that.
sentences.cn: 我们采访的两位高美顾客表示将继续与高美合作.

sentences.en: Edited by Jerry Mander and Edward Goldsmith.
sentences.cn: 由杰瑞.曼特和爱德华. 戈德史密斯编辑.

sentences.en: Goldsmith had given them all the ready money he had.
sentences.cn: 戈德史密斯把自己的全部现钱都给他们了.

sentences.en: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is wind-proof.
sentences.cn: 戈德史密斯修理了屋顶，以确保房屋能够抗风。

sentences.en: It was an idiom he'd caught from Carol Goldsmith.
sentences.cn: 这是他从卡洛尔·戈德史密斯那儿学来的一句口头禅.

sentences.en: Later, the goldsmith Benvenuto Cellini boasted to anyone who would listen of his miraculous aim.
sentences.cn: 后来, 金匠本凡努托•切里尼逢人便吹嘘他枪法神准.

sentences.en: Most likely Goldsmith sketched his certain young fellow from life.
sentences.cn: 金史密斯画笔下的某些年轻小伙子形象,大多都能来自生活中的原型.

sentences.en: Ninety days later, true to his word, the goldsmith brought the crown.
sentences.cn: 过了90天后, 金匠果然如他所说的带着王冠来了.

sentences.en: Port Sudan is the gold jewelry from local goldsmith with a special hand - made process of refining.
sentences.cn: 苏丹港的黄金首饰是由当地金匠用特殊的手工工艺精制而成的.
戈德史密斯 说,强有力的领导人不会飘飘然.

sentences.en: The goldsmith beats gold into goldleaf.
The goldsmith might also write notes promising so much gold and not promising the return of any particular item of gold.
sentences.cn: 这个金匠会写下票据,保证归还一定数量的金子,但是不保证归还某个特定的金器

sentences.en: The guilt of the goldsmith was proved beyond a doubt.
sentences.cn: 金匠的罪状,毫无疑问是肯定的了.

sentences.en: These little are great to little men . ---- O . Goldsmith.
sentences.cn: 小人总是把些小事弄的很大.

sentences.en: They had safes in their shop and some people would say to the goldsmith I have some valuables.
sentences.cn: 他们在自己的店里有保险柜,有些人会对这些金匠说,我有一些贵重物品。

sentences.en: This is Irving's appraisal of Oliver Goldsmith.
sentences.cn: 这是欧文对奥利弗·戈德史密斯的评语.

trans.tran_en: someone who makes or sells things made from gold
